description: Designed and developed an iOS mobile app to allow the user to interact with their data stored on an external memory storage accessory. The app allows the user to a) capture pictures and videos to store directly to external memory, and b) transfer data between the iPhone/iPad and the external accessory.

To manage the project, I setup two virtual machines: one to host our gitlab server for version control of our software and the other to host Redmine as our project and bug management tool. As the project grew and involved outside developers I migrated the gitlab installation to bitbucket and Redmine to an Amazon EC instance.
In addition, I developed debugging tools that would allow developers to interrogate the communication bus between the external accessory and the iOS app.
